question: The Yogi Adityanath government has decided to celebrate 'UP Diwas' on __________.
explanation: The Yogi Adityanath government has decided to celebrate 'UP Diwas' on January 24. The decision was taken at a cabinet meeting chaired by the chief minister Yogi Adityanath. The United Provinces unit was renamed as Uttar Pradesh on on January 24, 1950.
